verbs.description: [ARG1: Kelly] [V: was] [ARG2: the Homeland Security secretary] [ARGM-TMP: before President Donald Trump asked him to oversee the White House staff after a tumultuous summer in 2017] .
Kelly was the Homeland Security secretary before [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: asked] [ARG2: him] [ARG1: to oversee the White House staff] [ARGM-TMP: after a tumultuous summer in 2017] .
